org.xbib.elasticsearch.index.query.functionscore.condboost

Class CondBoostFactorFunctionParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.elasticsearch.index.query.functionscore.condboost.CondBoostFactorFunctionParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.functionscore.ScoreFunctionParser

    public class CondBoostFactorFunctionParser
extends Object
implements org.elasticsearch.index.query.functionscore.ScoreFunctionParser
    Parses out a function_score function that looks like: 
         {
         "cond_boost": {
             "value" : 1.0,
             "factor" : 1.0,
             "modifier" : "NONE",
             "cond" : [
               {
                 "product" : "product_name_1",
                 "value" : 5.0
               },
               {
                 "user" : "user_1",
                 "value" : 10.0
               }
             ]
         }
     }
